how_to_activate.title: How to Become a Knight
how_to_activate.subtitle: Follow these simple steps to activate your lifetime license
how_to_activate.step1_description: Visit our official website and purchase your Grimorium lifetime license. You'll get access to all features without limitations.
how_to_activate.step2_description: After purchase, you'll receive an email with your email address and license key in XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX format.
how_to_activate.step3_description: Open Grimorium, go to Settings > My Account and click 'Activate License'. Enter your email and key to be promoted to Knight!
